InvoiceMiningHero.title: Invoice Data Extraction
InvoiceMiningHero.description: Upload your invoices in PDF format or as images (e.g., JPG, PNG). The system will automatically extract the necessary data and display it in a clear table. You can then easily upload the extracted data to your accounting systems or use it for various analyses.

successBox.message: Invoices have been added to the queue and data extraction to the table is in progress. Results will be available within a few minutes at most.
